This was my first steam game. Really enjoy playing the game. Even more fun with a couple of friends. I would highly recommend this for people new to steam. Very noob friendly. 1000+ hours later, still a great game.

這遊戲歷經了多少年頭依然是我最愛的遊戲也是我願意花錢的遊戲
 評分8/10

This game, while incredibly fun to play, has one of the steepest learning curves I have ever seen in a competetive multiplayer game. The problem is that there is no real tutorial to speak of (besides the shitty one that Valve included for NOT EVEN HALF OF THE CLASSES) so players are thrown into the deep end when they join a game. 
*new player joins game*
*gets obliterated by Machina sniper*
*gets backstabed by a spy with 4,500 hours in game*
*gets Market Gardened*
*rage quits because fuck this pos game*

Now I dont say this because I hate this game, rather much the opposite. Just dont expect anyone to hold your hand when you join a lobby for the first time, and dont even get me started on the goddamn F2P system its broken for everyone except the best of players who unlock everything within their first 7 hours. Also, I would like to give credit to the balance of the weapons. I have played other class based shooters where specific classes and their respective weapons were overpowered (namely Overwatch and Paladins) but I do not see this issue in TF2. There are several dozens of items, and besides some exceptions, if you learn the quirks of a weapon you can preform well with it in a pub/casual whatever. Its probably obvious that I do not play competitive or highlander to anyone who plays this game more than I do, and to make it clear, I am only talking about Casual mode. For me, right now, TF2 is only a fun game, I dont have enough time in my day to possibly get invested into comp. 

Overall, very fun game. Would highly Recommend this game to anyone who is willing to put the time into climbing the skill curve. would r8 7/8 g8 gam.

1390 óra... úristen. Ez a játék egy mestermű (a Dishonored után). Mennyit játszottam, mennyit öltem, mennyit barátkoztam... ha valaki akar egy olyan játékot, amiben saját felszerelésed, harci stílusod lehet, akkor ez az a játék. Mostanában nem játszok vele, amit egyszerűen nem tudok érvekkel elmondani. Viszont ez a comment lehet végső búcsúm a játéktól, és mielőtt elmennék, mondok valamit: ez egyszerűen egy tökéletes játék. Hogy miért? Ezt a játékot nem rontják el patchekkel, mindig valamilyen eseménykor jön frissítés, ami csak egyes pályák kinézetét, ezenbelül homorosságát, hangját tolja meg. Ez az a játék ami mindig ugyanaz a játék marad. Ajánlom mindenkinek!
Este juego es muy adictivo, me encants

Team Fortress 2 görülen o ki bir hayli sevilen bir oyun olmuş durumda. Lütfen bu oyunu oynayacaksanız lütfen kendinizi vererek, [u] düzgünce	[/u] oynayın. Aksi taktirde 1 saat oynayıp bu oyunun ne kadar kötü olduğunu söylemeyin. Evet. Oyuna gelecek olursak eğer gün geçtikçe güncellenmekte fakat buna karşı çıkanda var, övende. Ben her zaman bu oyunun günden güne gelişimine karşı çıkan kimselere ''Birde madalyonun öteki yüzüne bak!'' derim. Fakat inatçı değilim. Anlayışınız için teşekkür ederim iyi oyunlar dilerim.

классная не запарная игрушка. матч ищется от 10сек  до 1 мин. и самое главное её отличие это то что вещи здесь реально что то делают, а не как в ксго просто скин. они меняют характеристики оружий или вовсе заменяют его на что то другое, добавляя или убирая что нибудь. Вообщем советую игру тем кто любит простые мультиплеерные шутеры от первого лица.
守望先锋的原型，有开放的mod，耐玩性比较高
